entry.title: Hi.
entry.content:
This site contains material for the courses I teach at the University of Waterloo.

Courses offered in 2014-2015

  • INTEG 120: Disciplines and Integrative Practices
  • INTEG 251 / SOC ###: Creativity and Innovation
  • INTEG 375 / SOC 312: Science & Technology in Society

Courses in development

  • The Craft of Research / Research Methods
  • The Politics of Information and Knowledge
  • Public Understanding of Science

Independent Studies courses I have done with Knowledge Integration students

  • Applied Social Network Analysis
  • Cultural Boundaries of Science
  • Multiple courses in organizational theory and analysis
